title: Throwback Alert: POWERMAN 5000, ILL NIÑO, TRAPT & (HED) P.E. Announce US Tour
description: Yes, Trapt. The post Throwback Alert: POWERMAN 5000, ILL NIÑO, TRAPT & (HED) P.E. Announce US Tour appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 3 hours ago
text: Well, here's a real tour that you can go to in 2025. Powerman 5000 has announced a US trek with Ill Niño (who've recently found themselves in some hot water), Metal Injection favorites Trapt, (hed) p.e., and The Great Alone. The tour kicks off on July 1 at Sunshine Studios in Colorado Springs, CO and wraps up on August 2 at Brentwood Emporium in Brentwood, CA. Tickets are available here. 7/1 Colorado Springs, CO Sunshine Studios (no Ill Niño)7/3 Lakewood, OH Mercury Music Lounge7/4 Columbus, OH The King Of Clubs (no (hed)p.e.)7/5 Ludington, MI Stix7/6 Hobart, IN Hobart Art Theater7/8 Hartford, CT The Webster7/9 Liverpool, NY Sharkeys Event Center7/1 Portland, ME Aura7/11 Foxborough, MA Six String Grill7/12 Marion Center, PA Rayne Drop Inn (Outdoors)7/13 Norfolk, VA The NorVa7/15 Jacksonville, FL Jack Rabbits7/16 Mt. html:
Well, here's a real tour that you can go to in 2025. Powerman 5000 has announced a US trek with Ill Niño (who've recently found themselves in some hot water), Metal Injection favorites Trapt, (hed) p.e., and The Great Alone. The tour kicks off on July 1 at Sunshine Studios in Colorado Springs, CO and wraps up on August 2 at Brentwood Emporium in Brentwood, CA. Tickets are available here.

7/1 Colorado Springs, CO Sunshine Studios (no Ill Niño)
7/3 Lakewood, OH Mercury Music Lounge
7/4 Columbus, OH The King Of Clubs (no (hed)p.e.)
